name: Legend of the True Ninja
description:
You are the True Ninja, a master in the art of stealth.  However, your enemies cursed you with a spell and you need to find your real self among the replicas, who try to follow your every moves.

Defeat the illusion and prove you are the Only One True Ninja.

A short game inspired by Hidden in Plain Sight.

Programming by Raphaël Tran
Art by Julien MS
